instruction: Can visible and near-infrared spectroscopy (VNIR) be considered a superior method compared to traditional methods for predicting soil heavy metals and pollution indices in the related study to predict soil heavy metals and pollution indices?
Output: Yes, visible and near-infrared spectroscopy (VNIR) can be considered a superior method compared to traditional methods for predicting soil heavy metals and pollution indices in the related study.
